title: KPMG Analytics and Visualization Environment
description: The KAVE combines the power of a Lambda Stack, with a development line and core analysis tools.

title: Tachyon Service for Ambari
description: An Ambari service to manage Tachyon in cluster mode

title: Maven
description: An Ambari Stack service package for the Apache Maven java package build tool.

title: VNC
description: An Ambari Service to deploy VNC service and developer tools. Allows users to remote desktop into cluster and start coding with Eclipse/IntelliJ on Spark/Storm

title: OpenTSDB
description: An Ambari Service to deploy/monitor opensource timeseries DB on top of HBase. Allows users to implement their own Google Finance-like functionality on HDP

title: FreeIPA server
description: An Ambari service for deploying/managing combined LDAP/KDC for Identity Management via Ambari

title: Kerberos KDC
description: An Ambari service for deploying/managing KDC (for kerberos ticket management) via Ambari

title: NSLCD
description: An Ambari service for deploying/managing NSLCD (for LDAP user lookups from OS) via Ambari

title: OpenLDAP
description: An Ambari service for deploying/managing OpenLDAP (an opensource LDAP) via Ambari

title: R
description: An Ambari service package for R with pre-installed packages for working with data in Hadoop (rhdfs, rmr2, plyrmr)

title: Jupyter (iPython)
description: An Ambari service for Jupyter (IPython3) Notebooks. It comes with Python2.7 and many packages for working with data in Hadoop (pydoop, scikit-learn, pandas, numpy, scipy, etc.)

title: Zeppelin
description: An Ambari service for Zeppelin, a web-based notebook that enables interactive data analytics. You can make beautiful data-driven, interactive and collaborative documents with SQL, Scala and more.

title: Solr
description: An Ambari Service to deploy/monitor Solr platform for search on HDP - Lucidworks is working on getting this added to official HDP 2.3

title: API explorer
description: An Ambari View to explore its REST API

title: iFrame view
description: Embed any web app into Ambari

title: Ambari store view
description: An Ambari View that provides access to a collection of Views and Services for Apache Ambari.

title: Elastic Search
description: An Ambari service for deploying/managing Elastic search via Ambari

title: Spring XD
description: https://spring.io/blog/2015/06/02/apache-ambari-meets-spring-xd

title: Hbase metrics view
description: View to graphically monitor Hbase metrics

title: Hortonworks Sandbox
description: Hortonworks Sandbox is the easiest way to get started with Enterprise Hadoop: a free single-node cluster in a virtual machine complete with step-by-step tutorials.

title: Spark Tutorial
description: Hands-on Tour of Apache Spark in 5 Minutes
